Web table

Source: R/webTable.R
webTable.Rd

Web table

Usage

webTable(
  data,
  caption = NULL,
  digits = 3,
  rnames = FALSE,
  buttons = NULL,
  file_name = NULL,
  scrolly = NULL
)

Arguments

data

Dataset.

caption

Title for the table.

digits

Digits number in the table exported.

rnames

Row names.

buttons

Buttons: "excel", "copy" or "none". Default c("excel", "copy")

file_name

Excel file name

scrolly

Windows height to show the table
